name: Night in the Woods (itch) (cowboybob)
description:
You've been sent to explore a mysterious disturbance in the woods. Survive as long as you can this journey won't be easy. Using W, S, A, D for movement and Left mouse click to attack. Harvest trees for wood to stack up your wood pile for when night comes. This project was created in about 9 days for the September 2022 MigJam. The theme is Survival with a constraint of DOT (Damage Over Time). I had a fun time making this game and hope there's not too many bugs.

Resources:

Player Asset: https://opengameart.org/content/gothicvania-patreons-collection
